question: [File: aptos-core/api/src/events.rs] [Function: get_events_by_event_handle()] [IdentifierWrapper deserialization] Can malicious unicode in field_name.0 at line 147 cause different parsing in IdentifierWrapper vs Identifier conversion? (Medium)
